tit.j: 醍醐コミュニティバス

tit.e: How the route bus was started
How the route bus was started
tit.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 醍醐地区は元々京阪バスと京都市営バスにより路線バスが運行されており、JR奈良線、京阪本線の六地蔵駅やJR東海道線の山科駅、京都市内中心部（四条河原町など）を結んでいた。
sen.e: Originally there was route bus run by Keihan bus and Kyoto City Bus in Daigo area, and it used to connect Rokujizo Station of JR Nara Line, Keihan Main Line or Yamashina Station of JR Tokaido line, Kyoto City centre area. (Shijo Kawara machi and so on)

Originally, there was a route bus run by Keihan bus and Kyoto City Bus in the Daigo area, and it connected Rokujizo Station of the JR Nara Line, Keihan Main Line or Yamashina Station of the JR Tokaido line and the central Kyoto City area (Shijo Kawara machi and so on).

Originally, there was a bus route run by Keihan bus and Kyoto City Bus in the Daigo area, and it connected Rokujizo Station of the JR Nara Line, Keihan Main Line or Yamashina Station of the JR Tokaido line and the central Kyoto City area (Shijo Kawara machi).
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: しかし、1997年に京都市営地下鉄東西線が開業し、醍醐地区を走る路線バスについて路線再編が行われることとなった。
sen.e: However when Kyoto Municipal Subway Karasuma Line/Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line opened, there was re-organization of the bus route which run within Daigo area.
However, when the Kyoto Municipal Subway Karasuma Line/Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line opened, there was a reorganization of the bus route that ran within the Daigo area.
However, when the Kyoto Municipal Subway Tozai Line opened in 1997, there was a reorganization of the bus route that ran within the Daigo area.
sen.cmt: in 1997補足Karasuma Line/Kyoto City Subway削除

sen.j: これにより、京都市交通局は醍醐地区の各路線の廃止や京阪バスへの移管を行い、同時に京都市営バス醍醐営業所を廃止することとなった。
sen.e: Due to above, Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau abolished some bus routes in the Daigo area and changed the route to Keihan Bus, at the same time Kyoto City Bus Daigo Eigyosho (Daigo business office) was closed permanently.

Consequently, the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau abolished some bus routes in the Daigo area and changed the route to Keihan Bus, while at the same time Kyoto City Bus Daigo Eigyosho (Daigo business office) closed permanently.

Consequently, the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau abolished some bus routes in the Daigo area or designated the route to Keihan Bus, while at the same time Kyoto City Bus Daigo Eigyosho (Daigo business office) closed permanently.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: また、京都市交通局から路線の意見を受けることとなった京阪バスにおいても、大幅な再編が行われた。
sen.e: There was a major re-organization of the route of Keihan Bus who was going to receive some opinions by Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau in terms of the route.
There was a major reorganization of the route of Keihan Bus, which was going to receive opinions from the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau in terms of the route.
There was a major reorganization of the bus routes run by Keihan Bus, which was to run routes transferred from the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: これにより、路線バスによる京都市内中心部へアクセスができなくなったことや、幹線道路に路線バスが運行されているものの、醍醐地区では小高い丘や坂の上に住宅や団地がある多くみられることから、地下鉄開業に伴いそれまでよりも不便になったと認識する住民が出始めた。
sen.e: Due to above, some people who live locally in Daigo area started to complain that there is no access from route buses to Kyoto Centre area, or after the subway opened, it was not convenient to catch the bus compare to before, since there were many housing complex or residential area located on the small hill in Daigo area, although there are route bus run on the arterial road.

Given the above, local residents of the Daigo area complained that there was no access from route buses to the central Kyoto City area, or that after the subway opened it less convenient to catch the bus compare than it had been, since there were many housing complexes and residential areas located on the small hill in the Daigo area, although the route bus ran on the arterial road.

Given the above, local residents of the Daigo area complained that there was no access by bus to the central Kyoto City area and although there was a bus route on the main road, given that the Daigo area has many residential areas on small hills, it less convenient after the subway opened
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: このため、醍醐地域の住民は、2001年9月に自治町内会連絡協議会などが中心となった「醍醐地域にコミュニティバスを走らせる市民の会」を設立し、京都市交通局をはじめとした関係団体に路線バスの運行を強く求めていくこととなった。
sen.e: Because of above reason, local people in Daigo Ward established 'To run community buses in the Diago area" citizens' association' in September 2001, which was mainly organized by Residents' liaison and discussion association, and people started to strongly demand to run route bus against Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau and other related groups.

Accordingly, local people in Daigo Ward established 'To Run Community Buses in the Daigo Area Citizens' Association' in September 2001, which was mainly organized by the Residents' Liaison and Discussion Association, and people started to strongly demand the operation of the bus route by the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau and other related groups.

Accordingly, local people in the Daigo Ward established 'To Run Community Buses in the Daigo Area Citizens' Association' in September 2001, which was mainly organized by the Residents' Liaison and Discussion Association, and people started to strongly demand a local bus route.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: しかし、京都市全体の財政難なども問題となっていたことから、行政による運行は困難であると判断し、住民の手により自主的に運行をする形を目指すこととなった。
sen.e: However there was a financial problem within Kyoto City and it was decided to be difficult to run the bus by the government, local people aimed to run the route bus instead independently.

However, there was a financial problem within Kyoto City, so it was considered that the government would have difficulty running the bus, so the local people decided they would run the route bus independently.
However, it was considered that the government would have difficulty running the bus because of its financial condition, so the local people decided they would run thebus route independently.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: なお、京都市側は京阪バスに循環バスの運行を要請し、これについては2002年に運行が開始されることとなった。
sen.e: By the way Kyoto City demanded Keihan Bus to run circulating buses and it was decided to run the bus in 2002.
Incidentally, Kyoto City demanded that Keihan Bus run circulating buses, and in 2002 the decision was made to do so.
Incidentally, Kyoto City demanded that Keihan Bus run circulating buses, and in 2002 the decision was made to do so.

sen.j: ただし、これは運賃やダイヤなど多くの面で住民側が求めていたものと異なるものであった。
sen.e: However it was not quite the same fare or time table of the bus in many ways which local people wished for.
However, the fare structure and timetable of the bus weren't quite what people had hoped for.
However, the fare structure and timetable of the bus weren't quite what people had hoped for.

sen.j: このような状況下で、「市民の会」は専門家や事業者などを交えた形で会合を行い、住民の手による自主的な路線バスの運行を行う方針で急速に計画を進めていった。
sen.e: Under this circumstances, after 'citizens association' had some meetings with some experts and business group, they rapidly started to organize to run buses which was going to be run by the citizens association.

Given such circumstances, after the "Citizens Association" had meetings with some experts and business groups, they soon began to organize in order to have buses that would be run by their own association.

Given such circumstances, after the 'Citizens Association' had meetings with some experts and business groups, they soon began to organize a local bus system that would be run by their own association.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 2003年6月には路線バスの運行を担当するヤサカバスと「市民の会」および運行に関する協力金を出すこととなる法人や団体を交えた形で運行に関する契約を締結することとなった。
sen.e: In June 2003, there was a contract in relation to the running of the bus signed by the Yasaka Bus who was going to be in charge of running route buses, and 'citizens association', and other sponsor companies or groups who support the bus financially.

In June 2003, there was a contract in regard to the running of the bus signed by Yasaka Bus, which would be in charge of running the route buses, while the Citizens Association and other sponsoring companies or groups would support the bus financially.

In June 2003, a contract for running the bus signed by Yasaka Bus, which would be in charge of running the route buses, and the Citizens Association and other sponsoring companies or groups would support the bus financially.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: また、2003年11月には近畿運輸局に路線バス運行の許可を申請した。
sen.e: They also applied for the permission of running route buses to Kinki Transport Bureau in November 2003.
In November 2003 they also applied to the Kinki Transportation Bureau for permission to run route buses.
In November 2003 they also applied to the Kinki Transportation Bureau for permission to run route buses.

sen.j: そして、2004年2月16日に運行を開始することとなった。
sen.e: And the route bus started to run on February 16, 2004.
The route bus started running on February 16, 2004.
The route bus started running on February 16, 2004.

tit.e: The condition after the bus started running
The condition after the bus started running
The situation after the bus started running
tit.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 運行計画時点での見込みは1日当たり500人程度であったが、営業開始から10ヶ月程度たった時点では600人程度と予測を上回ることとなった。
sen.e: The expected number of the passenger while planning the running of the bus was about five hundred passengers a day, however, just after ten month of the commencement of the operation, the number of the passenger increased to six hundred passengers, which was more than expected figure.

The expected number of passengers during the planning of bus operations was approximately 500 each day, but just after ten months of operation the number of passengers increased to 600, thus significantly exceeding the expected figure.

The expected number of passengers during the planning of bus operations was approximately 500 each day, but just after ten months of operation the number of passengers increased to 600, thus significantly exceeding the expected figure.

sen.j: また、利用客数が累計10万人に達した時期は想定よりも大幅に速かった。
sen.e: The period when cumulative total of the passengers used the route bus came to a hundred thousand was earlier that it was initially expected.
The point at which the cumulative total of passengers reached 100,000 came sooner than had been expected.
The point at which the cumulative total of passengers reached 100,000 came sooner than had been expected.

sen.j: 利用形態は醍醐地域住民の通学・病院・スーパーなどの域内移動、各住宅地から醍醐駅 (京都府)・石田駅 (京都府)への移動手段および醍醐寺や隋心院をはじめとした観光スポットへの移動手段であった。
sen.e: The examples of how people used the buses are, students going to school, people going to the hospitals or supermarket from Daigo area, going from each residential area to Daigo Station (Kyoto Prefecture), Ishida Station (Kyoto Prefecture), or going to sightseeing places such as Daigo-ji Temple or Zushin-in Temple.

The examples of how people used the buses are: students going to school, people going to the hospital or the supermarket from the Daigo area, going from residential areas to Daigo Station (Kyoto Prefecture), Ishida Station (Kyoto Prefecture), or going to sightseeing destinations such as Daigo-ji Temple or Zushin-in Temple.

The examples of how people used the buses are: students going to school, people going to the hospital or the supermarket from the Daigo area, going from residential areas to Daigo Station (Kyoto Prefecture), Ishida Station (Kyoto Prefecture), or going to sightseeing destinations such as Daigo-ji Temple or Zushin-in Temple.

sen.j: なお、当初は京都市の敬老乗車証の対象外であったが、住民からの要望を受け2006年10月から利用可能となった。
sen.e: By the way it was outside the area where older people can use their Freedom pass in Kyoto City, however it was approved to use the Freedom pass from October 2006 after there was demand received from the local people.
By the way, it was outside the area where older people can use the Freedom Pass in Kyoto City; however, in October 2006, due to public demand, approval was given to use the pass.
Initially, the route was not included in the area where older people could use the Freedom Pass in Kyoto City; however, in October 2006, due to public demand, approval was given to use the pass.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 運行開始当初は、自治体の補助を受けずに運営する自主運行のコミュニティバスとして、日本各地からの多く人々が視察に訪れた。
sen.e: When the route buses first started its operation, many people came to see the bus from all over Japan, which was know as community bus run individually without having financial support from the autonomous body.
When the route buses first started operating, people from all over Japan came to see the bus, which was known as a community bus run individually without financial support from the autonomous body.
When the route buses first started operating, people from all over Japan came to see the bus, which was known as a community bus run individually without financial support from an autonomous body.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 醍醐寺において、毎年2月に行われる五大力尊仁王会、4月に行われる花見行列の際には、特別輸送体制が組まれる。
sen.e: There is special transportation system with the route bus is organized at Godairikison Ninno-e festival in February and cherry blossom viewing parades in April at the Daigo-ji Temple.
sen.cmt: 特別輸送体制 - 定訳不明
sen.e: A special transportation system incorporating the route bus is organized for the Godairikison Ninno-e festival in February and the cherry-blossom viewing parades in April at Daigo-ji Temple.
A special transportation system incorporating the route is organized for the Godairikison Ninno-e festival in February and the cherry-blossom viewing parades in April at Daigo-ji Temple.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: すなわち、醍醐寺前と地下鉄醍醐駅を結ぶ道路の一部区間が通行止めとなるため、同区間を走る4号路線のルートが一部変更となる。
sen.e: In another words, due the part of road closure between in front of Daigo-ji Temple and subway station, Daigo-ji Temple station, the bus route usually run this sector, No.4 route will be changed.
In another words, due the partial road closure from the front of Daigo-ji Temple to the subway station, (Daigo-ji Temple Station), the No. 4 bus route usually run in that section is changed.

In another words, due to the partial road closure from the front of Daigo-ji Temple to the subway station, (Daigo-ji Temple Station), the No. 4 bus route that usually runs in that section is modified..
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: そのため「醍醐東団地」と「醍醐寺前」バス停が休止となり、醍醐寺前と醍醐駅を結ぶ道と、新奈良街道が立体交差する付近に「臨時醍醐寺前」バス停が設置される。
sen.e: Because of above, the bus stop 'Daigo Higashi Danchi (Daigo east housing estate) ' and 'Daigo-ji Temple ' will be closed, and other bus stop, 'Temporally Daigo-ji Temple' will be placed around the street connecting between Daigo-ji Temple and Daigo Station, and the place where Shin Nara-kaido Road makes multi-level crossing.

Consequently, the bus stop 'Daigo Higashi Danchi (Daigo East Housing Estate)' and 'Daigo-ji Temple' will be closed and another bus stop, 'Temporary Daigo-ji Temple,' will be set up on the street connecting Daigo-ji Temple, Daigo Station and the place where Shin Nara-kaido Road makes a multi-level crossing.

Consequently, the bus stop 'Daigo Higashi Danchi' (Daigo East Housing Estate) and 'Daigo-ji Temple' will be closed and another bus stop, 'Temporary Daigo-ji Temple,' will be set up on the street connecting Daigo-ji Temple, Daigo Station and the place where Shin Nara-kaido Road makes a multi-level crossing.

sen.j: また、地下鉄醍醐駅前と臨時醍醐寺前間のみを走行する臨時バスが増発される。
sen.e: There will also be additional temporally bus organized which only run between subway Daigo Station and temporally Daigo-ji Temple.
There will also be an additional temporary bus organized to run only between subway Daigo Station and the temporary Daigo-ji Temple stop.
There will also be an additional temporary bus organized to run only between the Daigo subway station and the temporary Daigo-ji Temple stop.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: さらに、当日は輸送量が激増するため、ヤサカバスが洛西地域の路線で使用している黄色の大型車両を、醍醐地域まで回送して一部投入する体制をとる。
sen.e: Furthermore, due to the heavy volume of the transportation on the day will be expected, Yasaka bus will use some of their yellow large-size coach, which is used in the route of Rakusai area, the empty coach will be send to Daigo area.

Furthermore, due to the expected heavy volume of transportation on the day, Yasaka Bus will use one of its large yellow coach buses, which is used on the Rakusai area route, and the empty coach will be sent to the Daigo area.

Furthermore, due to the expected heavy volume of transportation on the day, Yasaka Bus will use one of its large yellow coach buses, which is used on the Rakusai area route, and the empty coach will be sent to the Daigo area.

sen.j: 桜シーズンには「快速 醍醐寺」行きが設定されている。
sen.e: In cherry blossom season, 'high speed Daigo-ji Temple' bus will be available.
In cherry blossom season, the 'high-speed Daigo-ji Temple' bus will be available.
In cherry blossom season, the 'high-speed Daigo-ji Temple' bus will be available.

sen.j: 平成20年2月29日4号B路線を廃止
